title: Broken Vessel
summary: An empty shell driven by a bright infection; erratic leaps and bursting blobs fill the arena.
overview: A swift, erratic duel mixing cross-slashes, dives and infection bursts. Beating it opens the path to new mobility.
where: Ancient Basin — sealed chamber to the east.
drops: Access to Monarch Wings (in the area beyond)
notes: Punish after cross-slashes and dive recoveries; clear infection balloons before healing.

title: Brooding Mawlek
summary: A territorial beast that spits corrosive globs and swipes with huge claws.
overview: Optional early challenge combining big leaps, claw swipes and acid spits in a tight arena.
where: Forgotten Crossroads — hidden room behind breakable walls.
notes: Stay mid-range to read spit patterns; dash through landings and counter.

title: Brothers Oro & Mato
summary: Nail masters who trade precise thrusts and coordinated rushes.
overview: Coordinated nail masters who alternate pokes, rushes and parries with few open windows.
notes: Don’t chase; punish the brother who finishes an animation while the other retreats.

title: The Collector
summary: A playful captor that tosses bottled creatures nonstop and bounds around the room.
overview: Ceiling-skittering menace that constantly drops jarred enemies to overwhelm you.
where: City of Tears — Tower of Love (locked by Love Key).
notes: Prioritize breaking jars to control the room; punish ground touches.

title: Crystal Guardian
summary: A miner warped by crystals; fires laser bursts and rattling charges.
overview: Crystal-warped miner who fires sweeping beams and dashes; tests line-of-sight and vertical movement.
where: Crystal Peak — near mining halls and the bench area.
notes: Use cover and short hops to weave between beams; listen for charge audio cues.

title: Dung Defender
summary: A proud knight who rolls dung orbs and dives underground to surprise foes.
overview: Rhythmic arcs of dung and tunneling dives from a jovial knight of the old guard.
notes: Jump/dash over dung arcs; after tunneling there’s a safe punish (or heal) window.

title: False Knight
summary: A small brute in oversized armor; big, telegraphed swings and long staggers.
overview: Introductory armor shell with big tells; staggers open long opportunities.
notes: Strike the exposed head after slams to trigger staggers; great time to heal.

title: Flukemarm
summary: An immobile broodmother that floods the arena with flying spawn.
overview: Stationary broodmother that spawns fluke swarms constantly.
notes: Spell burst (e.g., Shade Soul) clears adds quickly; avoid being cornered.

title: God Tamer
summary: A duelist who fights alongside a plated beast; pressure comes from the pair.
overview: Duelist partnered with a plated beast; the fight is about managing both threats.
where: Kingdom’s Edge — Colosseum of Fools (Trial of the Fool).
drops: Trial of the Fool completion rewards
notes: Focus the beast to open brief punish windows on the Tamer; don’t get sandwiched.

title: Great Nailsage Sly
summary: A legendary teacher: blistering slashes, parries, and swift techniques.
overview: Lightning-fast duel with feints, parries and tight punish windows.
notes: Keep hops low; micro-dash and counter after parries or recovery frames.

title: Grimm
summary: A theatrical demon who dances through fire, projectiles, and teleports.
overview: Flame-dancing troupe master with teleports, bats and vertical slashes.
where: Dirtmouth — Grimm Troupe tent (Grimm Troupe questline).
notes: Learn the tempo of fire-bats and dives; punish after grounded recoveries.

title: Gruz Mother
summary: A giant fly that ricochets with charges; bursts into hatchlings on defeat.
overview: Early flyer that ricochets around; collapses into hatchlings after defeat.
notes: Bait dives and punish; save a bit of Soul for the hatchling cleanup.

title: Hive Knight
summary: Guardian of the hive: rapid thrusts and swarms of bees punish airborne foes.
overview: Relentless guardian mixing lance flurries with bee swarms; high mobility check.
notes: Hit-and-run; prioritize evading drones to preserve heal windows.

title: The Hollow Knight
summary: A tragic vessel mixing lunges, shockwaves, and searing infection.
overview: Climactic duel of slashes, skewers and infection bursts with sparse heal windows.
where: Temple of the Black Egg — endgame arena.
notes: Heal on collapses or long recoveries; stay composed during chain skewers.

title: Hornet Protector
summary: Needle and thread: feints, blocks, and traps that demand precise timing.
overview: Precise duel that teaches dash timing and patient punishes; first meeting with Hornet.
where: Greenpath — central arena beyond the lakes.
notes: Respect throws and lunges; punish after thread recoveries and needle plants.

title: Mantis Lords
summary: A duel of clear patterns that escalates into coordinated sister attacks.
overview: Honorable trial that unlocks respect and safe passage through the village.
notes: Phase 1 solo patterns; Phase 2 duo rhythm. Hold center to avoid teleports on top of you.

title: Massive Moss Charger
summary: A mossy mound that barrels forward and breaks apart; open after charges.
overview: Big, readable charges and brief punish windows—simple but satisfying.
notes: Keep centerline; step aside late, then counter during recovery.

title: Nosk
summary: A mimic wearing familiar faces; wall dashes and sticky infection sprays.
overview: Predator with long charges and corruption spits in a platformed arena.
where: Deepnest — hidden tunnels off the nest.
notes: Bait charges at mid-distance; jump-dash over and avoid corners.

title: Oblobbles
summary: A twin swarm spitting crossed volleys; the survivor enrages.
overview: Twin flyers that spit crossing volleys; the survivor speeds up after the first falls.
where: Kingdom’s Edge — Colosseum of Fools (Trial of the Conqueror).
drops: Trial of the Conqueror completion rewards
notes: Even their HP if possible; otherwise prepare for a faster, denser second phase.

title: Paintmaster Sheo
summary: A nail artist who paints elemental strokes and sweeping cuts.
overview: Artist’s duel with three brush styles: broad strokes, sharp slashes and ink rain.
notes: Read color/pose to pre-position; keep calm during ink rain and counter on landings.

title: Radiance
summary: A being of light saturating the arena with blades, beams, and platforms.
overview: True final fight with platform phases, beams, orbs and expanding pressure.
where: Dream realm — after Hollow Knight with Awoken Dream Nail.
notes: Route platforms safely; conserve dashes for diagonal beams and the final climb.

title: Soul Master
summary: Scholar of the capital; teleports and plunges empowered by Soul.
overview: Two-phase caster with fake-out slams and Soul orbs; tests teleport reads.
notes: Wait out the fake slam; in phase 2, keep moving to avoid rapid mini-slams.

title: Soul Warrior
summary: An ethereal fighter who summons shades and strikes from the air.
overview: Agile mini-boss with leaps, teleports and conjured blades.
where: City of Tears — Soul Sanctum (multiple rooms).
notes: Stay slightly below/diagonal; punish after plunges and teleport recoveries.

title: Traitor Lord
summary: A banished ruler: blistering rushes and low sweeping cuts.
overview: Overwhelming rushes and wide slashes guarding the gardens’ path forward.
notes: Keep lateral space for rushes; punish the long recovery after ground shocks.

title: Uumuu
summary: An electric mass protected by fields; openings arrive via allies’ shocks.
overview: Invulnerable until its field is broken—timed openings with an ally’s help.
notes: Circle wide until the field drops, then burst damage; beware of electric adds.

title: Vengefly King
summary: A buzzing tyrant that leads charges and summons swarms.
overview: Bulky flyer that leads charges and summons adds; appears in trials and an early event.
where: Greenpath (Zote rescue event) / Colosseum (Trial of the Warrior).
notes: Clear adds quickly; short punishes after charge recoveries.

title: Watcher Knight
summary: Twin knights in relay; the room fills with rolls and leaps.
overview: Rolling, leaping guardians fought in sequence; the room snowballs if not controlled.
notes: Reduce their count fast—an environmental trick can disable one before the fight.

title: Zote
summary: Self-styled hero undone by his own bluster and blunders.
overview: Blustering duelist more dangerous to himself than to others—appears in trials and events.
notes: Play it safe; his recoveries are long and easy to punish.
